meaningMnemonic: Some things happen outside of <kanji>reason</kanji>. They happen <kanji>in addition</kanji> to it. That's called <vocabulary>divine providence</vocabulary>. You can't explain it, but something outside of reason definitely influenced the things around you.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
